ai-patthana12.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.7:0.3_0: There are causes and reasons for this.
ai-patthana12.7:1.1_0: Not for the sake of a cause, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.7:1.1_1: Not for the sake of a cause, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.7:1.1_2: Not for the sake of a cause or reason for the sake of deceiving cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.7:2.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of cause, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.7:2.1_1: Not for the sake of cause or reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, that gives rise to a cause.
ai-patthana12.7:2.1_2: No cause for the sake of cause or reason for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of purification of mind, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_1: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of purification of principle, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_2: Not for the sake of a cause or reason for the sake of debates, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana12.7:4.1_4: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.7:5.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.7:6.1_0: (This is the same way as the other in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.7:7.1_0: doesn’t for the sake of demonation.
ai-patthana12.7:8.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_1: It is not possible for a reason to give rise to the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_3: for the sake of won’t movement to both.
ai-patthana12.7:10.1_0: For the sake of lack of gaining gifts,
ai-patthana12.7:10.1_1: nor does she cause any reason for the sake of this.
